name: Love is Slime
description:
As two friends seek adventure and the glory of becoming heroes, one of them falls inexplicably in love with a girl, whose love he cannot hope to attain. But as an opportunity to win her love presents itself, will this young friend choose love over his friend and their dream? What will he choose? What will you choose?

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

X to interact/Attack

*Note: If you bypass certain areas too quickly, some dialogue may be cut short so that the story can continue more smoothly. If you would like to experience the whole story, try to wait till the characters are done speaking before moving to the next area. Apologies in advance
